backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature that removes six specific gallery images by deleting their entries from galleryImages.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including styles, config, HTML, layout, and sections.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to deploy the site to IC mainnet and verify static gallery assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, GA4 tracking, favicon, and font loading for Arapey and Jost.
frontend/README-GALLERY-ASSETS.md: Instructions for replacing gallery images using a zip file and updating assets in the gallery directory.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component assembling site sections with a feature flag controlling the Collections section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Empty placeholder file for the site footer component.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed header with logo, smooth-scrolling navigation, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section listing four manufacturing capabilities using cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Section showing four key designer benefits with icon cards and a centered heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Renders a collections grid with thumbnails chosen via memoized random selection and displays titles, descriptions, and tags.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact cards for phone and location plus CTA buttons for WhatsApp messaging and Google Maps directions.
frontend/src/components/sections/CustomC: Shows a custom carpets promo section with a hero image, capabilities list, and a WhatsApp CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Implements an image gallery with lazy-loaded thumbnails, error handling, modal preview, and a link to view more.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides the hero banner with a background image, intro text, and CTAs for viewing the gallery or starting a project.
frontend/src/components/sections/UsefulL: Renders a responsive grid of external links with icons, splitting primary and remaining links.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines contact details and exports a helper to build WhatsApp URLs with encoded messages.
frontend/src/config/usefulLinks.ts: Exports a list of external links such as Instagram, Google, and WhatsApp Channel.
frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts: Defines image categories, metadata types, and the galleryImages array storing all gallery image entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, identity loading, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, typography rules, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Generates encoded public asset URLs by sanitizing paths and respecting the build’s base URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color mappings, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and pending requests including image removal tasks.
